schema.description: 证书ID。证书管家中证书的全局唯一标识符。

CertificateChain.example: -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----  (Sub CA Certificate PEM Content)  -----END CERTIFICATE-----  -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----  (Sub CA Certificate PEM Content)  -----END CERTIFICATE-----  -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----  (Root CA Certificate PEM Content)  -----END CERTIFICATE-----

400.errorMessage: The specified parameter is not valid.

404.errorMessage: The specified AccessKey ID does not exist.

title: 获取证书
summary: 调用GetCertificate接口查询证书管家托管的证书。
description: 本文将提供一个示例，查询ID为`9a28de48-8d8b-484d-a766-dec4****`的证书信息，包括证书、证书链、证书ID和证书请求。
